Package com.meepcraft.backbone.api

Class BackbonePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • com.meepcraft.backbone.api.BackbonePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
    public abstract class BackbonePlugin
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    An API to allow plugins to easily utilize BoneMesh functionality.
    Author:
    Caleb L. Power

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(BackboneRequest request)
        Dispatches a request to all other servers. Automatically retries failed transmissions.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        true if all servers received the request
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(BackboneRequest)

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(BackboneRequest request,
                                        boolean retryOnFailure)
        Dispatches a request to all other servers. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        Returns:
        true if all servers received the request on the first try
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(BackboneRequest, boolean)

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                                        BackboneRequest request)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest)

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                                        BackboneRequest request,
                                        boolean retryOnFailure)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission on the first try
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, boolean)

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                                        BackboneRequest request,
                                        RequestAckListener... ackListeners)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        ackListeners - additional acknowledgement listeners to attach to the payload
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, RequestAckListener...)

      • dispatchRequest

        public abstract boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                                        BackboneRequest request,
                                        boolean retryOnFailure,
                                        RequestAckListener... ackListeners)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        ackListeners - additional acknowledgement listeners to attach to the payload
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission on the first try
        See Also:
        BackboneAPI.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, boolean, RequestAckListener...)
